resources.string: Copy a video link and press the facebook logo below.
After that, open your gallery and peek inside FBVid.
You have denied storage permissions and this app can\'t download video. Try granting permission from Settings > Apps

Step 1 ⇒ Open Facebook.
 Step 2 ⇒ Click share of Facebook Video Post.
 Step 3 ⇒ Share to DownFBVid.
 Step 4 ⇒ Click Facebook Logo.
 Step 5 ⇒ Video is Downloaded.
 Step 6 ⇒ View it in Downloaded Video Page.
